constants.formatDate: @@(d) => { const months = ['Jan', 'Feb', 'Mar', 'Apr', 'May', 'June', 'July', 'Aug', 'Sep', 'Oct', 'Nov', 'Dec']; if (d) { const splitdate = d.split('/'); if (splitdate.length > 0) { const numericMonth = parseInt(splitdate[0]) - 1;  return `${splitdate[1]} ${months[numericMonth]} ${splitdate[2]}`; } } return d;}
constants.md: @@(label, value, format, key) => { const f = { price: formatPrice, ctn: formatTelephone }; return { key: key != null ? key : value, label, value: format && f[format] && value != null  ? f[format](value) : value } }
constants.mt: @@(lineAmountInfo = []) => lineAmountInfo.map(data => ({key: data.ctn, label: formatTelephone(data.ctn), children: [md('Total Charge', data.totalChargeAmount, 'price'), md('Credit', data.totalAdjustmentAmount, 'price')] }))

widgetProps.disabledDate: @@(() => { const BLOCKED_UI_DAYS = [29, 30, 31, 1, 2, 3]; let BLOCK_ALL_UNTIL = moment().format('YYYYMMDD'); let TODAY = moment().format('YYYYMMDD'); const billCycleInfo = data[1].accountDetails.billCycleResetDetails; if (billCycleInfo.billCycleResetBlockIndicator === 'true' && billCycleInfo.blockBillCycleResetTillDate) { BLOCK_ALL_UNTIL = moment(billCycleInfo.blockBillCycleResetTillDate).format('YYYYMMDD'); }  return (current) => { const day = current && +current.format('DD'); const curr = current && current.format('YYYYMMDD'); return curr !== TODAY && curr < BLOCK_ALL_UNTIL || BLOCKED_UI_DAYS.includes(day); } })();
